name: Same Differences [Prototype]
description:
This project was made for the GameJam 2020 hosted by  GameDevHQ.  We had  a week to create a game based on the theme: "CHOOSE".

Known Issue

There is currently no sound in the WebGL version. Please use the Windows version executable if you can.

The Game

The game is base on a random dungeon generator. We wanted to make it possible work in different styles. It does have the features.

Guess you can choose which button you press in the main menu?
Or choose your path to doom?

The Theme

We wanted to give the player the choice between: Medieval or Futuristic. Also Horror or Joy.

The first choice would change the texture and size of the rooms.

The second would change how the lights are and type of monsters. 

Controls

Currently only supports mouse and keyboard.

Move: WASD

FPCamera: Mouse

Button: Left Mouse Click

Quit while In-Game: ALT+F4 / ALT-TAB / ESC

The Music

The music and SFX were done by Sulfide. you can listen to the song of the title screen Here on Soundcloud
